title: T205 super tough SP & HOF P42s
author: t206kid

posts.post_title: T205 super tough SP & HOF P42s
posts.post_content:
Prices assume no fee method (add 3% for paypal goods). Shipping included.

SHORT PRINTS:
Dolly Gray with stats - PSA 2 Sovereign back - $430
Bobby Wallace no cap 1 line stats - PSA 1 - $575
Irvin Wilhelm "suffe ed" - SGC 30 - $250

PIEDMONT 42s:
Christy Mathewson SGC 20 P42 - $500
Joe Tinker PSA 3 P42 - $180
Bobby Wallace no cap 2 lines stats - PSA 2 P42 - $330
Kirb White SP - SGC 30 P42 - $160
